Interface InternshipAppRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryInternshipAppRepository
public interface InternshipAppRepository
repository interface for managing persistence of internship applications supports CRUD operations and custom query-based retrieval

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    delete(String appId)
    remove an application record from storage
    List<InternshipApplication>
    findAll()
    retrieve all internship application records

    find an internship application by its unique ID
    List<InternshipApplication>
    findByInternship(String internshipId)
    retrieve applications submitted for a given internship
    List<InternshipApplication>
    findByStudent(String studentId)
    retrieve applications submitted by a specific student
    List<InternshipApplication>
    findWithdrawalRequests()
    retrieve applications with withdrawal requests flagged

    save or update an internship application record

  • Method Details

    • save

      void save(InternshipApplication app)
      save or update an internship application record
      Parameters:
      app - internship application to store

    • findById

      Optional<InternshipApplication> findById(String id)
      find an internship application by its unique ID
      Parameters:
      id - application identifier
      Returns:
      optional containing application if found, else empty

    • findAll

      List<InternshipApplication> findAll()
      retrieve all internship application records
      Returns:
      list of all applications

    • findWithdrawalRequests

      List<InternshipApplication> findWithdrawalRequests()
      retrieve applications with withdrawal requests flagged
      Returns:
      list of applications requesting withdrawal

    • findByStudent

      List<InternshipApplication> findByStudent(String studentId)
      retrieve applications submitted by a specific student
      Parameters:
      studentId - student identifier
      Returns:
      list of matching applications

    • findByInternship

      List<InternshipApplication> findByInternship(String internshipId)
      retrieve applications submitted for a given internship
      Parameters:
      internshipId - internship identifier
      Returns:
      list of matching applications

    • delete

      void delete(String appId)
      remove an application record from storage
      Parameters:
      appId - identifier of application to delete
